maintenance margin"}],"DA_AmountIsZero()":[{"details":"emitted when a bid is submitted for 0% of the portfolio"}],"DA_AuctionAlreadyInInsolvencyMode()":[{"details":"emitted when someone tries mark an bid"}],"DA_ReservedCashGreaterThanMtM()":[{"details":"emitted when reserved cash exceeds MTM. Auction should be terminated and restarted."}],"DA_ScenarioIdNotWorse()":[{"details":"can only specify an id that make the IM worse"}],"DA_SenderNotOwner()":[{"details":"emitted when a user doesn't
